titles.title: Mobilize AMERICA Act
Mobilize AMERICA Act
Mobilize America to Manufacture Equipment Required for Independence from Communist Adversaries Act
A bill to establish a grant program to expand the domestic production of certain medical supplies.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Mobilize America to Manufacture Equipment Required for Independence from Communist Adversaries Act or the Mobilize AMERICA Act
This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to award grants to manufacturers of pharmaceuticals and other medical supplies to ensure domestic availability of critical materials to respond to pandemics or other public health emergencies.
